tagline: Sync your files across all devices effortlessly
description: A modern cloud storage solution that keeps your files synchronized across all your devices with enterprise-grade security and blazing-fast speeds.

hero.headline: Your Files, Everywhere You Need Them

about.title: Built for Modern Teams
about.content: CloudSync Pro was created by a team of cloud storage experts who were frustrated with slow, complicated solutions. We built the tool we wished existed - fast, secure, and incredibly easy to use. Join thousands of teams who trust CloudSync Pro with their most important files.

meta.title: CloudSync Pro - Secure Cloud Storage & File Sync
meta.description: Fast, secure cloud storage with instant file synchronization across all devices. Enterprise-grade security, team collaboration, and affordable pricing.
